definitions.definition: Heaven.
Something, especially a person's name in legal documents, that appears higher on the same page or on a preceding page.
Higher authority.
Betterment, raised status or condition.
Of heaven; heavenly.
(by ellipsis) Being located higher on the same page or on a preceding page.
Directly overhead; vertically on top of.
Higher in the same page; earlier in the order as far as writing products go.
Into or from heaven; in the sky.
definitions.example: He's in a better place now, floating free as the clouds above.

definitions.definition: In a higher place; upstairs; farther upstream.
Higher in rank, power, or position.
definitions.example: He appealed to the court above.

definitions.definition: In addition.
More in number.
Above zero; above freezing.
definitions.example: It was a cold day at only 5 above.

definitions.definition: On the upper half or the dorsal surface of an animal.
definitions.example: The sparrow I saw was rufous above and off-white below.

definitions.definition: Physically over; on top of; worn on top of, said of clothing.
definitions.example: He always put his coat on above his sweater.

definitions.definition: In or to a higher place; higher than; on or over the upper surface.
Farther north than.
Rising; appearing out of reach height-wise.

Higher than; superior to in any respect; surpassing; higher in measure, degree, volume, or pitch, etc. than; out of reach; not exposed to; not likely to be affected by; incapable of negative actions or thoughts.
definitions.example: Even the chief of police is not above suspicion.

definitions.definition: Higher in rank, status, or position.
definitions.example: to stand head and shoulders above the rest

definitions.definition: In addition to; besides.
definitions.example: above and beyond the call of duty

definitions.definition: Surpassing in number or quantity; more than.
definitions.example: That amount is way above our asking price.

definitions.definition: In preference to.
Too proud to stoop to; averse to; disinclined towards;
definitions.example: The owner was above taking more than a token salary.

definitions.definition: Beyond; on the other side.
Upstage of.
